description: The NRC will hire a Project Manager to assist in office renewal projects over the next 3 years, Project Manager will have a minimum security level of B and a minimum resource level of B. Mandatory requirements include Canada and its regional FTAs and WTO-AGP as detailed in the bid note, and a 3-year period of contract from July 2024 to June 2025, with 2 one-year extension options. The bid note invites 20 companies to submit proposals. Estimated Level of Effort (days): 350.
duration_in_months: There is no actual duration stated in the record but based on the given start and end dates this would be approximately 12 months
full_summary:
***********************************************************************************
TSPS Project Management Services Office Renewals
***********************************************************************************

**Contract Title**: TSPS Project Management Services Office Renewals
**Reference Number**: cb-117-2034147
**Tender Status**: Expiré
**Publication Date**: 2024-05-07
**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-29T14:00:00
**Amendment Date**: 2024-05-29

**Background Information**
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking a Project Manager to assist with three distinct projects under the Office Renewal Initiative over the next 3 years.

**Procurement Details**
- **Notice Type**: Demandes de proposition
- **Procurement Method**: Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif
- **Selection Criteria**: Variations or combinations of the above methods
- **Applicable Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), etc.

**Contract Duration**
The proposed contract period is 3 years, with options for 2 additional 1-year extensions. The estimated level of effort is 350 (jours) days.

**Security Level**
The required security level for the company and resources is Protected B.

**Important Note**
This tender is limited to Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for the project management services stream.

**Accordance with Trade Agreements**
This tender is in accordance with the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other relevant trade agreements.

**Contact Information**
For more information, please contact Paul Hewitt at Paul.Hewitt@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca or by phone at (343) 573-1068.

**Points de Rappel**
La méthode d’approvisionnement des services professionnels centrés sur les tâches et solutions (SPTS) est mise à jour chaque trimestre. Si vous désirez savoir comment vous pouvez devenir un « titulaire d’AA qualifié », veuillez communiquer avec SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA

***********************************************************************************
This rewritten text adheres to professional standards:

*   Respectful tone and language
*   Clear and concise information
*   Proper organization and formatting
*   Accurate
